description: With P7ZDesktop not working right with non-latin symbols, this is a great working supported alternative.
summary: Works great and supports utf8 file names

description:
A few issues:
· When you open the window to select the files you want to add and select some, what you selected is unselected when you navigate (e.g. to select other files).
· When you drag in a folder, if the folder has something inside that cannot be copied due to permission issues, it will abort the operation entirely and not provide, say, a dialog asking whether to skip it (like with Files/"Nautilus").
summary: Lacking in UX and performance, but gets the job done

description: It's not the most modern or awesome app ever, but it lets you access compressed files in a tremendous variety of formats, and it works. A necessary part of my workflow.
It works correctly, I am satisfied.
It gets the job done, handles basic unzipping archives just fine. I still prefer the unzip command line command but this works in a pinch.
It doesn't integrate well into files application as context.
summary: Doesn't handle rar files and can't do batch unzip, unrar

description: File Roller is an easy to use, efficient and easy on the eyes archive manager that can handle pretty much any compressed file format as long as the right codecs are installed.

description:
Das Programm kann sehr viele Dateitypen öffnen und lässt sich leicht bedienen. Allerdings ist die Nutzbarkeit an vielen Stellen verbesserungswürdig. Als Beispiel ist hier zu nennen, dass das Entpacken mit einem Dialog bestätigt wird, den man aktiv schließen muss. Auch sind die Tastenkombination Strg+C und Strg+V wirkungslos.

Alles in Allem gut zum Ver- und Entpacken von Dateien geeignet.

description:
Archivos y Ficheros comprimidos

  bunzip2 file1.bz2: descomprime in fichero llamado ‘file1.bz2’.
  bzip2 file1: comprime un fichero llamado ‘file1’.
  gunzip file1.gz: descomprime un fichero llamado ‘file1.gz’.
  gzip file1: comprime un fichero llamado ‘file1’.
  gzip -9 file1: comprime con compresión máxima.
  rar a file1.rar test_file: crear un fichero rar llamado ‘file1.rar’.
  rar a file1.rar file1 file2 dir1: comprimir ‘file1’, ‘file2’ y ‘dir1’ simultáneamente.
  rar x file1.rar: descomprimir archivo rar.
  unrar x file1.rar: descomprimir archivo rar.
  tar -cvf archive.tar file1: crear un tarball descomprimido.
  tar -cvf archive.tar file1 file2 dir1: crear un archivo conteniendo ‘file1’, ‘file2′ y’dir1’.
  tar -tf archive.tar: mostrar los contenidos de un archivo.
  tar -xvf archive.tar: extraer un tarball.
  tar -xvf archive.tar -C /tmp: extraer un tarball en / tmp.
  tar -cvfj archive.tar.bz2 dir1: crear un tarball comprimido dentro de bzip2.
  tar -xvfj archive.tar.bz2: descomprimir un archivo tar comprimido en bzip2
  tar -cvfz archive.tar.gz dir1: crear un tarball comprimido en gzip.
  tar -xvfz archive.tar.gz: descomprimir un archive tar comprimido en gzip.
  zip file1.zip file1: crear un archivo comprimido en zip.
  zip -r file1.zip file1 file2 dir1: comprimir, en zip, varios archivos y directorios de forma simultánea.
  unzip file1.zip: descomprimir un archivo zip.
